trans-unit.source: Discovers attributed parts in the dynamic link library (DLL) and EXE files in an application's directory and path.
trans-unit.target: 发现动态链接库 (DLL) 中的特性化部分以及应用程序目录和路径中的 EXE 文件。

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类型实现<xref:System.IDisposable>接口。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接释放类型，调用其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>中的方法`try` / `catch`块。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分<xref:System.IDisposable>接口主题。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The element used by diagnostics to identify the source for parts.
trans-unit.target: 诊断用于标识部件源的元素。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog" /> class by using the specified source for parts.
trans-unit.target: 通过部分使用指定相对源模式初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The reflection context.
trans-unit.target: 反射上下文。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog" /> class by using the specified reflection context.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的反射上下文来初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The reflection context.
trans-unit.target: 反射上下文。

trans-unit.source: The element used by diagnostics to identify the source for parts.
trans-unit.target: 诊断用于标识部件源的元素。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog" /> class by using the specified reflection context and source for parts.
trans-unit.target: 通过部分使用指定相对反射上下文和源模式初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.DirectoryCatalog" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.DirectoryCatalog" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个循环访问集合的枚举器。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 用于循环访问集合的枚举数。

trans-unit.source: The conditions of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> objects to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> 对象的条件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the export definitions that match the constraint expressed by the specified import definition.
trans-unit.target: 获取与指定的定义所表示的约束相匹配的导入定义。

trans-unit.source: A collection of objects that contain the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> objects and their associated <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" /> objects that match the specified constraint.
trans-unit.target: 一个集合，包含 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> 对象及与其关联的、并与指定的约束相匹配的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.DirectoryCatalog" /> object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.DirectoryCatalog" /> 对象已被释放。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="definition" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="definition" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the display name of the application catalog.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用程序目录的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a human-readable display name of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.DirectoryCatalog" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.DirectoryCatalog" /> 对象的可读显示名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ICompositionElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ICompositionElement> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the composition element from which the application catalog originated.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用程序目录源自于的组合元素。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 总是为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ICompositionElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ICompositionElement> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a string representation of the application catalog.
trans-unit.target: 检索应用程序目录的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the catalog.
trans-unit.target: 目录的字符串表示形式。
